values: To pound something is to hit it many times with a lot of force.
He pounded the nail with the hammer.
英镑
n. 英镑；兽栏；重击，重击声；拘留所
vt. 捣烂；敲打；监禁，拘留
vi. 连续重击，猛击Pound庞德(姓氏)名 词:pounder

磅； 英镑
To pound is to hit or strike something repeatedly with force or to weigh a certain amount.
A pound is a unit of weight measurement equal to 16 ounces.
noun, verb
n. 英镑；重击，重击声；兽栏；拘留所,vt. 捣烂；敲打；监禁，拘留,vi. 连续重击，猛击
